items.title: Satay
items.description: Charcoal grilled marinated meat on bamboo skewers served with peanut sauce and cucumber relish choices of chicken or beef.

items.title: Tord Mun Pla
items.description: Deep fried fish cake with red curry paste, green beans and a cucumber relish sauce.

items.title: See Krong Moo Tord
items.description: Deep fried pork ribs marinated with garlic and pepper

items.title: Khanom Jeep
items.description: Steamed dumplings Thai style with minced pork, golden fried garlic and topped with special sauce.

items.title: Poh Pia Tord
items.description: Deep fried spring rolls with minced pork, vermicelli and mushroom served with plum sauce.

items.title: Pla Muek Tord
items.description: Tender squids dipped in batter served with sweet chilli sauce

items.title: Khanom Pang Nagoong
items.description: Crispy spice mince prawns on toast served with cucumber relish.

items.title: Tempura Goong
items.description: Deep fried prawns & mushroom served with plum sauce

items.title: Peek Gai Yat Sai
items.description: Deep fried boneless chicken wings stuffed with spicy minced pork and herbs served with chilli sauce.

items.title: Hi Bangkok Platter (Minimum for 2 people)
items.description: Delicious selections of Satays, fish cakes, Poh Pia Tord, prawns Tempura, Pla Muek Tord and stuffed chicken wings.

items.title: Tom Yum Goong
items.description: King prawns in rich hot aand sour broth spiced with chilli, lemon grass, kaffir lime leaves, mushroom and lemon juice

items.title: Tom Yum Gai
items.description: Similar to Tom Yum Goong but served with chicken
